page.title: 02Calendar of events in Laggan
page.content: JANUARY--First-footing;School Burn's Supper-Haggis,turnips;Burn's poems & songs. FEBRUARY--snowy weather prevents travel. MARCH--Choirs prepare for music festival. APRIL--tourist season begins. MAY--lambing;ploughing. JUNE--Barbecues;summer football JULY--sheep clipping;hay-making AUGUST--sheep-dog trials;Highland games;Barn dance. SEPTEMBER--grain harvest;church & hall sale. OCTOBER--potato harvest;Hallowe'en (guising & party)Harvest festival. NOVEMBER--Guy Fawkes-Bonfire night;St Andrew's night DECEMBER--Christmas party;carol singing to every home.
